name: Pollen
description: Pollen DeFi, is a decentralized asset index where the community holds the power. It is a decentralized platform for managing tokenized asset pools. The merit-based DAO provides a reputation-based governance protocol with incentives that leverage the communityâ€™s collective wisdom to curate asset pools. In this system, all users of the platform stand to benefit from the contribution of the best-performing participants.
